name: SweetLeaf
description:
This Game needs an Emulator such as Mesen to run! Sweetleaf is a Game for the NES featuring a little creature trying to hold the fabric of reality together in an unique world. I would greatly appreciate any comments or people streaming the game! If you do please let me know and thank you. <3 - In Development

A huge Thank you to Jason Cramer who made all of this possible and did a LOT of the programming work on here as well as to all my friends! 

The Soundtrack: https://smokinpeteria.bandcamp.com/album/sweetleaf-ost
